MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45pm to make repairs to an underground cable fault in South Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:18pm on 28th October 2020.
